An Albedo jams Multispectral Visors and targeting systems, preventing its bearer from being the target of an Enemy Trooper carrying that piece of Equipment.

{{css_skillbox |black|  ALBEDO | AUTOMATIC EQUIPMENT }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory, NFB. }}
{{effects}}
* Any enemy with a '''[[Multispectral Visor]]''' or the '''[[Marksmanship]]''' Special Skill who declares a [[BS Attack]] requiring [[LoF]], or [[Discover]], against the bearer of this piece of Equipment must apply a negative MOD to their Attribute, as shown in round brackets in the Unit Profile : Albedo (-3), Albedo (-6)...
* The Albedo MOD does '''not''' apply to [[CC Attacks]].
{{css_skillbox-end}}
